members.name: always
members.descriptionHtml: Visible always.

members.name: hidden
members.descriptionHtml: Hide checkboxes.

members.name: onHover
members.descriptionHtml: Visible on hover.

tables.name: ColumnActionsMode
tables.descriptionHtml: Enum to describe how a particular column header behaves.... This enum is used to to specify the property IColumn:columnActionsMode. If IColumn:columnActionsMode is undefined, then it's equivalent to ColumnActionsMode.clickable

members.name: clickable
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the column header is clickable.

members.name: disabled
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the column header as disabled.

members.name: hasDropdown
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the column header ias clickable and displays the dropdown cheveron.

tables.name: ColumnDragEndLocation
tables.descriptionHtml: Enum to describe where the column has been dropped, after starting the drag

members.name: header
members.descriptionHtml: Drag ended on Header

members.name: outside
members.descriptionHtml: Drag ended outside of current list

members.name: surface
members.descriptionHtml: Drag ended on current List

members.name: horizontalConstrained
members.descriptionHtml: If specified, constrains the list to the given layout space.

members.name: unconstrained
members.descriptionHtml: If specified, lets the content grow which allows the page to manage scrolling.

members.name: fixedColumns
members.descriptionHtml: Lets the user resize columns and makes not attempt to fit them.

members.name: justified
members.descriptionHtml: Manages which columns are visible, tries to size them according to their min/max rules and drops off columns that can't fit and have isCollapsible set.

members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Optional accessibility label (aria-label) attribute that will be stamped on to the element. If none is specified, the arai-label attribute will contain the column name

members.name: calculatedWidth
members.descriptionHtml: Internal only value.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: An optional class name to stick on the column cell within each row.

members.name: columnActionsMode
members.descriptionHtml: Defines how the column's header should render.

members.name: currentWidth
members.descriptionHtml: Internal only value. Remembers the actual witdh of the column on any case. On the other hand, calculatedWidth is only saved when it's defined by user, not for justified calculations.

members.name: data
members.descriptionHtml: Arbitrary data passthrough which can be used by the caller.

members.name: fieldName
members.descriptionHtml: The field to pull the text value from for the column. This can be null if a custom onRender method is provided.

members.name: filterAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: ARIA label for the status of this column when filtered.

members.name: groupAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: ARIA label for the status of this column when grouped.

members.name: headerClassName
members.descriptionHtml: An optional class name to stick on the column cell within each header.

members.name: iconClassName
members.descriptionHtml: Class name to add to the Icon component.

members.name: iconName
members.descriptionHtml: Optional iconName to use for the column header.

members.name: isCollapsable
members.descriptionHtml: If specified will allow the column to be collapsed when rendered in justified layout.

members.name: isCollapsible
members.descriptionHtml: If specified will allow the column to be collapsed when rendered in justified layout.

members.name: isFiltered
members.descriptionHtml: Determines if the column is filtered, and if so shows a filter icon.

members.name: isGrouped
members.descriptionHtml: If set will show a grouped icon next to the column header name.

members.name: isIconOnly
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not only the icon is used in the column header. Set this to true so the column name and dropdown chevron are not displayed.

members.name: isMenuOpen
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates whether a dropdown menu is open so that the appropriate ARIA attributes are rendered.

members.name: isMultiline
members.descriptionHtml: Determines if the column can render multi-line text.

members.name: isPadded
members.descriptionHtml: If set, will add additional LTR padding-right to column and cells.

members.name: isResizable
members.descriptionHtml: Determines if the column can be resized.

members.name: isRowHeader
members.descriptionHtml: Optional flag on whether the column is a header for the given row. There should be only one column with row header set to true.

members.name: isSorted
members.descriptionHtml: Determines if the column is currently sorted. Renders a sort arrow in the column header.

members.name: isSortedDescending
members.descriptionHtml: Determines if the arrow is pointed down (descending) or up.

members.name: key
members.descriptionHtml: A unique key for identifying the column.

members.name: maxWidth
members.descriptionHtml: Maximum width for the column, if stretching is allowed in justified scenarios.

members.name: minWidth
members.descriptionHtml: Minimum width for the column.

members.name: name
members.descriptionHtml: Name to render on the column header.

members.name: onColumnClick
members.descriptionHtml: If provided, will be executed when the user clicks on the column header.

members.name: onColumnContextMenu
members.descriptionHtml: If provided, will be executed when the user accesses the contextmenu on a column header.

members.name: onColumnResize
members.descriptionHtml: If provided, will be executed when the column is resized with the column's current width. Prefer this callback over `DetailsList` `onColumnResize` if you require the `IColumn` to report its width after every resize event. Consider debouncing the callback if resize events occur frequently.

members.name: onRender
members.descriptionHtml: If provided uses this method to render custom cell content, rather than the default text rendering.

members.name: onRenderDivider
members.descriptionHtml: If provider, can be used to render a custom column header divider

members.name: sortAscendingAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: ARIA label for the sort order of this column when sorted ascending.

members.name: sortDescendingAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: ARIA label for the sort order of this column when sorted descending.

members.name: draggedIndex
members.descriptionHtml: Specifies the source column index

members.name: targetIndex
members.descriptionHtml: Specifies the target column index

members.name: frozenColumnCountFromEnd
members.descriptionHtml: Specifies the number fixed columns from right

members.name: frozenColumnCountFromStart
members.descriptionHtml: Specifies the number fixed columns from left(0th index)

members.name: handleColumnReorder
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to handle the column reorder draggedIndex is the source column index, that need to be placed in targetIndex Deprecated, use `onColumnDrop` instead.

members.name: onColumnDragStart
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to handle the column dragstart draggedStarted indicates that the column drag has been started on DetailsHeader

members.name: onColumnDrop
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to handle the column reorder draggedIndex is the source column index, that need to be placed in targetIndex

members.name: onDragEnd
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to handle the column reorder

members.name: columns
members.descriptionHtml: Column metadata

members.name: selection
members.descriptionHtml: Selection from utilities

members.name: selectionMode
members.descriptionHtml: Selection mode

members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: ariaLabel for the entire header

members.name: ariaLabelForSelectAllCheckbox
members.descriptionHtml: ariaLabel for the header checkbox that selects or deselects everything

members.name: ariaLabelForSelectionColumn
members.descriptionHtml: ariaLabel for the selection column

members.name: ariaLabelForToggleAllGroupsButton
members.descriptionHtml: ariaLabel for expand/collapse group button

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Overriding class name

members.name: collapseAllVisibility
members.descriptionHtml: Whether to collapse for all visibility

members.name: columnReorderOptions
members.descriptionHtml: Column reordering options

members.name: columnReorderProps
members.descriptionHtml: Column reordering options

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Ref to the component itself

members.name: isAllCollapsed
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not all is collapsed

members.name: layoutMode
members.descriptionHtml: Layout mode - fixedColumns or justified

members.name: minimumPixelsForDrag
members.descriptionHtml: Minimum pixels to be moved before dragging is registered

members.name: onColumnAutoResized
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when column is automatically resized

members.name: onColumnClick
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when the column is clicked

members.name: onColumnContextMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when the column needs to show a context menu

members.name: onColumnIsSizingChanged
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when column sizing has changed

members.name: onColumnResized
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when column is resized

members.name: onRenderColumnHeaderTooltip
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to render a tooltip for the column header

members.name: onToggleCollapseAll
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when collapse all is toggled

members.name: selectAllVisibility
members.descriptionHtml: Select all button visibility

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Call to provide customized styling that will layer on top of the variant rules.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme from the Higher Order Component

members.name: columns
members.descriptionHtml: Column metadata

members.name: selection
members.descriptionHtml: Selection from utilities

members.name: selectionMode
members.descriptionHtml: Selection mode

members.name: cellStyleProps
members.descriptionHtml: Rules for rendering column cells.

members.name: checkboxVisibility
members.descriptionHtml: Checkbox visibility

members.name: columns
members.descriptionHtml: Column metadata

members.name: groupNestingDepth
members.descriptionHtml: Nesting depth of a grouping

members.name: indentWidth
members.descriptionHtml: How much to indent

members.name: selection
members.descriptionHtml: Selection from utilities

members.name: selectionMode
members.descriptionHtml: Selection mode

members.name: viewport
members.descriptionHtml: View port of the virtualized list

members.name: focusIndex
members.descriptionHtml: Scroll to and focus the item at the given index. focusIndex will call scrollToIndex on the specified index.

members.name: forceUpdate
members.descriptionHtml: Ensures that the list content is updated. Call this in cases where the list prop updates don't change, but the list still needs to be re-evaluated. For example, if a sizer bar is adjusted and causes the list width to change, you can call this to force a re-evaluation. Be aware that this can be an expensive operation and should be done sparingly.

members.name: getStartItemIndexInView
members.descriptionHtml: Get the start index of the page that is currently in view

members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: A text summary of the table set via aria-label.

members.name: ariaLabelForGrid
members.descriptionHtml: Aria label for grid in details list.

members.name: ariaLabelForListHeader
members.descriptionHtml: The aria-label attribute to stamp out on the list header

members.name: ariaLabelForSelectAllCheckbox
members.descriptionHtml: The aria-label attribute to stamp out on select all checkbox for the list

members.name: ariaLabelForSelectionColumn
members.descriptionHtml: An ARIA label for the name of the selection column, for localization.

members.name: cellStyleProps
members.descriptionHtml: Props impacting the render style of cells. Since these have an impact on calculated column widths, they are handled separately from normal theme styling, but they are passed to the styling system.

members.name: checkboxCellClassName
members.descriptionHtml: Optional class name to add to the cell of a checkbox

members.name: checkboxVisibility
members.descriptionHtml: Controls the visibility of selection check box.

members.name: checkButtonAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Check button aria label for details list.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Optional class name to add to the root element.

members.name: columnReorderOptions
members.descriptionHtml: Options for column re-order using drag and drop

members.name: columns
members.descriptionHtml: Given column defitions. If none are provided, default columns will be created based on the item's properties.

members.name: compact
members.descriptionHtml: Boolean value to indicate if the component should render in compact mode. Set to false by default

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IDetailsList interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: constrainMode
members.descriptionHtml: Controls how the list contrains overflow.

members.name: disableSelectionZone
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not to disable the built-in SelectionZone, so the host component can provide its own.

members.name: dragDropEvents
members.descriptionHtml: Map of callback functions related to row drag and drop functionality.

members.name: enableShimmer
members.descriptionHtml: If set to true and we provide an empty array, it will render 10 lines of whatever provided in onRenderMissingItem.

members.name: enterModalSelectionOnTouch
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not the selection zone should enter modal state on touch.

members.name: getGroupHeight
members.descriptionHtml: Optional function to override default group height calculation used by list virtualization.

members.name: getKey
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to get the item key, to be used in the selection and on render.

members.name: getRowAriaDescribedBy
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to get the aria-describedby IDs (space separated strings) of the elements that describe the item.

members.name: getRowAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to get the aria-label string for a given item.

members.name: groupProps
members.descriptionHtml: Optional override properties to render groups. The definition for IGroupRenderProps can be found under the GroupedList component.

members.name: groups
members.descriptionHtml: Optional grouping instructions. The definition for IGroup can be found under the GroupedList component.

members.name: indentWidth
members.descriptionHtml: Optional override for the indent width used for group nesting.

members.name: initialFocusedIndex
members.descriptionHtml: Optional default focused index to set focus to once the items have rendered and the index exists.

members.name: isHeaderVisible
members.descriptionHtml: Controls the visibility of the details header.

members.name: items
members.descriptionHtml: The items to render.

members.name: layoutMode
members.descriptionHtml: Controls how the columns are adjusted.

members.name: listProps
members.descriptionHtml: Optional properties to pass through to the list components being rendered.

members.name: minimumPixelsForDrag
members.descriptionHtml: The minimum mouse move distance to interpret the action as drag event.

members.name: onActiveItemChanged
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when an item in the list becomes active by clicking anywhere inside the row or navigating to it with keyboard.

members.name: onColumnHeaderClick
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when the user clicks on the column header.

members.name: onColumnHeaderContextMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when the user asks for a contextual menu (usually via right click) from a column header.

members.name: onColumnResize
members.descriptionHtml: Callback fired on column resize

members.name: onDidUpdate
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when the details list has been updated. Useful for telemetry tracking externally.

members.name: onItemContextMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when the context menu of an item has been accessed. If undefined or false are returned, ev.preventDefault() will be called.

members.name: onItemInvoked
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when a given row has been invoked (by pressing enter while it is selected.)

members.name: onRenderDetailsFooter
members.descriptionHtml: An override to render the details footer.

members.name: onRenderDetailsHeader
members.descriptionHtml: An override to render the details header.

members.name: onRenderItemColumn
members.descriptionHtml: If provided, will be the "default" item column renderer method. This affects cells within the rows; not the rows themselves. If a column definition provides its own onRender method, that will be used instead of this.

members.name: onRenderMissingItem
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for what to render when the item is missing.

members.name: onRenderRow
members.descriptionHtml: If provided, will allow the caller to override the default row rendering.

members.name: onRowDidMount
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when a given row has been mounted. Useful for identifying when a row has been rendered on the page.

members.name: onRowWillUnmount
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when a given row has been unmounted. Useful for identifying when a row has been removed from the page.

members.name: onShouldVirtualize
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to determine whether the list should be rendered in full, or virtualized. Virtualization will add and remove pages of items as the user scrolls them into the visible range. This benefits larger list scenarios by reducing the DOM on the screen, but can negatively affect performance for smaller lists. The default implementation will virtualize when this callback is not provided.

members.name: rowElementEventMap
members.descriptionHtml: Event names and corresponding callbacks that will be registered to rendered row elements.

members.name: selection
members.descriptionHtml: Optional selection model to track selection state.

members.name: selectionMode
members.descriptionHtml: Controls how/if the details list manages selection. Options include none, single, multiple

members.name: selectionPreservedOnEmptyClick
members.descriptionHtml: By default, selection is cleared when clicking on an empty (non-focusable) section of the screen. Setting this value to true overrides that behavior and maintains selection.

members.name: selectionZoneProps
members.descriptionHtml: Addition props to pass through to the selection zone created by default.

members.name: setKey
members.descriptionHtml: A key that uniquely identifies the given items. If provided, the selection will be reset when the key changes.

members.name: shouldApplyApplicationRole
members.descriptionHtml: Boolean value to indicate if the role application should be applied on details list. Set to false by default

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Style function to be passed in to override the themed or default styles

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by the Higher Order Component

members.name: usePageCache
members.descriptionHtml: Boolean value to enable render page caching. This is an experimental performance optimization that is off by default.

members.name: useReducedRowRenderer
members.descriptionHtml: Rerender DetailsRow only when props changed. Might cause regression when depending on external updates.

members.name: viewport
members.descriptionHtml: Viewport, provided by the withViewport decorator.

members.name: cellsByColumn
members.descriptionHtml: Optional pre-rendered content per column. Preferred over onRender or onRenderItemColumn if provided.

members.name: checkboxCellClassName
members.descriptionHtml: Class name for the checkbox cell

members.name: checkButtonAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Check button's aria label

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Overriding class name

members.name: collapseAllVisibility
members.descriptionHtml: Collapse all visibility

members.name: compact
members.descriptionHtml: Whether to render in compact mode

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Ref of the component

members.name: dragDropEvents
members.descriptionHtml: Handling drag and drop events

members.name: dragDropHelper
members.descriptionHtml: Helper for the drag and drop

members.name: eventsToRegister
members.descriptionHtml: A list of events to register

members.name: getRowAriaDescribedBy
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for getting the row aria-describedby

members.name: getRowAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for getting the row aria label

members.name: item
members.descriptionHtml: Data source for this component

members.name: itemIndex
members.descriptionHtml: Index of the collection of items of the DetailsList

members.name: onDidMount
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for did mount for parent

members.name: onRenderCheck
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for rendering a checkbox

members.name: onWillUnmount
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for will mount for parent

members.name: rowFieldsAs
members.descriptionHtml: DOM element into which to render row field

members.name: shimmer
members.descriptionHtml: Whether to render shimmer

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Overriding styles to this row

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by styled() function

members.name: useReducedRowRenderer
members.descriptionHtml: Rerender DetailsRow only when props changed. Might cause regression when depending on external updates.

members.name: anySelected
members.descriptionHtml: Is any selected - also true for isSelectionModal

members.name: canSelect
members.descriptionHtml: Can this checkbox be selectable

members.name: checkClassName
members.descriptionHtml: The classname to be passed down to Check component

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Optional className to attach to the slider root element.

members.name: compact
members.descriptionHtml: Is this in compact mode?

members.name: isHeader
members.descriptionHtml: Is the check part of the header in a DetailsList

members.name: isSelected
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated, use `selected` instead.

members.name: isVisible
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not this checkbox is visible

members.name: selected
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not this check is selected

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Style override

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: columns
members.descriptionHtml: Column metadata

members.name: selection
members.descriptionHtml: Selection from utilities

members.name: selectionMode
members.descriptionHtml: Selection mode
